name: = PRINZE REGENT =
description:
a short twine by POLYMER DESPAIR

EXPERIENCE the thrilling life of a witless consort to a monstrous queen of an unruly kingdom.

Will you win her favour??

Will you help your kingdom??

The answer…is.... "probably not"...

FEATURING:

  • ONE (1) ENDING
  • sifting of the muck
  • catching of rats
  • Slabbing
  • you can get married, early and often
  • soothing gold/blue on peach colour scheme
